post:
Hello Folks,

ReadyDedis has been stable thanks to all the support received from this community. The following configurations are available, however, if you’re looking for something custom please do drop us a ticket and we’ll see what can be done for you~

**Our Intel-powered offerings**

[Los Angeles, US - Looking Glass](http://lg.lax01.readydedis.com/)
[Cloud 1GB - LA - $4/mo](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=31)
[Cloud 2GB - LA - $7/mo ](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=32)

[New York City, US - Looking Glass](http://lg.nyc01.readydedis.com/)
[Cloud 1GB - NY - $4/mo ](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=37)
[Cloud 2GB - NY - $7/mo ](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=38)

[Seattle, US - Looking Glass](http://lg.sea01.readydedis.com/)
[Cloud 1GB - SEA - $4/mo](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=46)
[Cloud 2GB - SEA - $7/mo](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=47)

[Atlanta, US - Looking Glass](http://lg.atl01.readydedis.com/)
[Cloud 1GB - ATL - $4/mo](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=53)
[Cloud 2GB - ATL - $7/mo](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=54)

[Mumbai, IN - Looking Glass](http://lg.mum01.readydedis.com/)
[Cloud 1GB - $4/mo ](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=85)
[Cloud 2GB - $7/mo](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=86)

**Our AMD Ryzen & NVMe offerings.**

[Falkenstein, DE - Looking Glass](http://lg.ger01.readydedis.com/)
[Cloud 1GB - $6/mo ](https://readydedis.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=70)

**The plan's resources are as follows**

Cloud 1GB
1vCore
1GB RAM
25GB SSD
Unmetered Bandwidth ( Except India )
1 IPv4

Cloud 2GB
2vCores
2GB RAM
40GB SSD
Unmetered Bandwidth ( Except India )
1 IPv4

We own all our hardware except at select locations such as Germany, all our Intel offerings are on Dell R620 / Supermicro powered - Dual E5 processors and 256GB RAM each powered by Samsung EVO SSD(s) on RAID-10 with the capacity to scale in terms of storage and network on demand.

**Add windows for an additional $3/mo only at any of our locations!**

**We don't offer DirectAdmin at our Indian location due to cost factors!**

**Control Panel**
We use the Hypervisor control panel completely owned and developed by us. It offers you full control over your server and also the ability to use a GUI based firewall, installation scripts and ssh keys as well.

**About Us**
Currently, we’re a team of experienced system administrators who’ve been exposed to servers, networking, and security. We’re based out of India but our company is registered and incorporated in Delaware, US in the year 2018.

**24x7 Support**
Normally we have proactive monitoring in place for all our servers, even so, if you should face any problem we’re always available on-call vide our phone number +1 302-597-7085 or our support platform via tickets.

**Payment Methods**
PayPal | Credit / Debit Card | Bitcoin | Alipay

**All orders are delivered instantly!**

**All the servers come with 1 hour managed support per month.**

**We also provide Hybrid servers with dedicated resources custom-tailored to your needs on request**
